checkoutTermsAndConditions: All sales are final. We do not offer refunds or exchanges for products or gift cards. Reward points have no cash value and may not be transferred or combined. Performance of any in-office treatment or procedure is at the sole discretion of our medical staff. If you are not an appropriate candidate for a procedure you have purchased, the purchase amount may be applied towards another procedure or products that are available on our store.
checkoutSurveyQuestion: Did one of our staff members recommend these products and/or cosmetic services to you?

businessInfo.verbiageForShipmentConfirmationForTreatm:
Thank you for your order from Eterna Cosmetic Surgery. You can check the status of your order by logging into your account. Once your package ships, we will send a shipping confirmation. If you requested a pickup, you will be notified when your order is ready for pickup. If you ordered an in-office procedure, please call our office at (210) 568-8186. You may also online.
 
LINK FOR APPT REQUEST: https://www.eternacosmeticsurgery.com/schedule-your-consultation-eterna-cosmetic-surgery
